alert.note: Alert for Keith; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 11:08PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Perkins and western Keith Counties through 1100 PM MDT... At 1008 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Venango, or 10 miles south of Big Springs, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brule, Lemoyne, Eagle Gulch Campground, Ruthon, Belmar, Clear Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Megeath, Otter Creek Campground and Lake View Campground. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 100 and 109. Highway 92 between mile markers 120 and 138. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 110 and 123. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
